content: *this is the first pattern ive ever written out for the public so please bear with me as im sure there will be a lot of kinks i dont have the means or time to do other sizes im very sorry * this pattern is for adult size small 22-23 medium 23 -24 or large size 24-25 knights helmet hat it s made twice as thick for extra warmth and stability the detachable and movable visor add extra protection on those cold days for your mouth and nose i designed this pattern myself because i love the idea of these knights helmets as a toque i searched around everywhere and couldn t find one i liked at all
